xml.brief: Retrieve information on a single geocache

desc.p: Retrieve information on a single geocache.

opt.name: fields
opt.p: Pipe-separated list of field names which you are interested with. Selected fields will be included in the response.

ul.li: oxcode - OX code of the geocache,
name - a dictionary (language code => plain-text string) of names of this geocache,
location - location of the cache in the "lat|lon" format (lat and lon are in full degrees with a dot as a decimal point),
type - cache type,
status - cache status,
owner_id - geocache owner's user ID,
founds - number of times the geocache was successfully found,
notfounds - number of times the geocache was unfound,
last_found - datetime string, the time when the geocache was last found,
size - integer (one of: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5), size rating of the container, or null if geocache does not have a container,
difficulty - float (one of: 1.0, 1.5, 2.0, 2.5, 3.0, 3.5, 4.0, 4.5, 5.0), difficulty rating of the cache,
terrain - float (one of: 1.0, 1.5, 2.0, 2.5, 3.0, 3.5, 4.0, 4.5, 5.0), terrain rating of the cache,
rating - integer (one of: 1, 2, 3, 4, 5), an overall rating of the cache, or null when the geocache does not have a sufficient amount of votes to have a rating,
rating_votes - number of votes submitted for the rating of this cache,
recommendations - number of recommendations for this cache,
descriptions - a dictionary (language code => HTML string) of cache descriptions,
hints - a dictionary (language code => plain-text string) of cache hints/spoilers; in general, hints should not be displayed to the user unless user specifically asks for them,

li.p: images - list of dictionaries, each dictionary represents one image saved along the cache description; each dictionary has the following structure:

ul.li: url - an URL of the image,
caption - a dictionary (language code => plain-text string) of image captions,
is_spoiler - boolean, if true then the image is a spoiler image and should not be displayed to the user unless the user explicitly asks for it.
last_modified - datetime string, represents the time when the geocache was last modified (changed status, attributes, etc.),
date_created - datetime string, represents the time when the geocache was initially created,
date_hidden - datetime string, represents the time when the geocache was first hidden.

returns.p: A dictionary of fields you have selected.
